title: Gluten free flour mix

ingredients.content: 160 g glutinous white rice (e.g. sushi rice)

preparations.content: Place white rice, glutinous rice and chia seeds into mixing bowl and mill <b>2 min/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add all remaining ingredients and mix <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer into a sealable storage jar or container until ready to use (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: Store in refrigerator for up to 7 days; flours containing milled rice may clump if stored in the pantry.
